Articles.Content:
use improper grammer till kills grammer police and kills you with nekomimi![troll_face_problem-1331px.png](https://t3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRuXgZxTn_pGYkGeryjRV8JAe8hPPFJ1J_CNNXvRA5-TjnaLFD8:clipartist.info/openclipart.org/2011/June/24-Friday/troll_face_problem-1331px.png)

its my hill with nekomimi maids like so![533914769.jpg](https://t0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ7bidQ_4CStY6ZrRAltNIuXRGDaG0UBcVpch0TUCFmOAhiv-aB:illuminammorpg.free.fr/upload/533914769.jpg)

I use the power of over 600! Posts to strike the hill with an unnaturally large lightning bolt. Killing all in a one mile radius, I continue to sit on mountain and watch.

Not my hill

tranfer my nekomimi maids to the mountian, reset the hill and walk to the mountian after laying inviso traps all over the hill.

aint my hill know more here you have it but i keep the reset button
Well, since nobody is taking the hill, it's mine now!

I stick you in the ground to grow crops for my base

my hill

I hire you for my space program, and this is what happens on your first flight:

![B59B773C0994D8BF613E0C76B4C4195E85470367](http://cloud-3.steampowered.com/ugc/684841644963527312/B59B773C0994D8BF613E0C76B4C4195E85470367/)

My hill.

I release the kraken

my hill
I kill the kraken. My hill.

I stole the reset button and retrofit it into the bomb ignition button. Then I pressed the button and KER-BOOM! A crater persists. I sat by in JPL in Pasadena, CA, and watched the carnage.

No one's hill crater.

**Edited <time datetime="2013-12-10T04:40:09Z" title="12/10/2013 04:40  AM" data-short="10 yr">December 10, 2013</time> by Designer225**

I quickly claim the crater and then turn it into a hill. My hill. I also put carborane acid all over the mountain and now eats away people who comes near it. I put on a acid proof glass suit that the acid will not corrode away watch.

Seeing as there's no such thing as carborane acid, I determine you've just poured water all over the hill. I plant some man-eating rosebushes to guard the hill for me, which proceed to eat you, while I drop a concrete bunker on the hill so save me from these vicious plants. My hill. And bunker.

Carborane acid H(CHB11Cl11) is a superacid [1] one million times stronger than sulfuric acid.[2][3] The reason for this high acidity is that the acid anion carborane (CHB11Cl11Ã¢Ë†â€™) is very stable and substituted with electronegative substituents (the chlorine atoms). H(CHB11Cl11) is the only acid known to protonate C60 fullerene without decomposing it.[4][5] Additionally, it is the only known anion capable of forming a stable, isolable salt with protonated benzene, C6H7+. In coordination chemistry carboranes can be used as unique bulky ligand scaffolds. It was recently demonstrated that the same carboranyl moiety can act either as strongly electron-withdrawing or electron-donating substituent, depending on the positional attachment of the cluster to the heteroatom.[6]Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ¢â‚¬â€œÃ¢â‚¬â€œÃ¢â‚¬â€œ WIKIPEDIA

HA. GOTCHA

I smash you with a giant "PHYSICS" book.

My hill. Now with Level 4 Sentry Gun - Sapper proof

> 
> I smash you with a giant "PHYSICS" book.
> My hill. Now with Level 4 Sentry Gun - Sapper proof

Heavy + ÃƒÂ¼bercharged medic = no more sentry.

My hill. And heap of scrap.

after many turns the temprial flux reapair system comes back on line and resets the hill to what it once was keeping the rubble bunker and giant man eating plant where they are in relation to the hill. and i build a new reset button

still aint my hill
I slap you for trying to reset my hill

by explaining the overly complex systems of how the  temprial flux reapair system works causes your head to explode and then i freeze you in a staysis field and clean up my mess.

aint my hill

I jump up behind you and stuff you in a crate, load it on a SRB, and shoot you to the Mun.

Meh Hyll.

well there goes toolofdarknes 567768 hope he has a good trip. i say as i snipe you from my mountian top position

still aint my hill

I glass the planet and the hill

MY GLASSED HILL

As JPL predicted, asteroid 99942 Apophis hit Earth. (Not really... Apophis is threat-less, for now. It ranked 0 in Torino Scale today. But this is all about sci-fi, right?) The damage to the hill is *devastating*, so bad that almost no one survived- unless you are nowhere from the hill. The damage will remain for another 1,000 years.

No one's Apophis Crater.

**Edited <time datetime="2013-12-11T01:46:04Z" title="12/11/2013 01:46  AM" data-short="10 yr">December 11, 2013</time> by Designer225**

My mission control sees this new crater as a perfect landing site and sends Jeb in with a nuclear powered lander to land at the site, bring out a remote control rover, and plant a flag.

My irradiated Apophis crater, Jeb, lander, rover, and flag!

I thought we were supposed to keep the hill intact?

I earthbend a new hill into existance out of the crater, and claim it as mine.

Parts of Apophis split from the asteroid as it impacts and created several other smaller craters.

Noname117's irradiated Apophis craters, Jeb, lander, rover, and flag.

beep auto hill reset activated stand back and enjoy your hill onece more.

now i will clam the hill in the name of me
